Name

cacm - C.A.C.M. algorithms

Description

Hidden in NEMO are a number of CACM algorithms. This page described some of their routines, and their usage. 
CACM 423 : decomp, solve
spline, seval                src/kernel/misc/spline.c

See Also


http://www.netlib.org
http://math.nist.gov/toms/    Transactions on Mathematical Software (TOMS)

Peter Teuben
